Actions.Name: Unholy
Actions.Effect: This action can also be made as a close blast 1 melee attack.

Actions.Name: Fear
Actions.Description: Mark a foe in range 6. While marked, that foe gains +1 curse on attacks and saves unless adjacent to an ally. If they end their turn adjacent to an ally, they can pass a save to clear this mark.

Actions.Name: Raise Dead
Actions.Description: Restore a defeated Relict in range 6 to 50% hp and remove incapacitated.

Actions.Name: Soul Shred
Actions.Description: Mark a foe in range 6. While marked, that foe gains Aura 1. Allies of that foe that end their turn in the aura take [fray] piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Radiance of the Black Sun
Actions.Description: This character becomes immobile but gains Aura 2 until the start of its next turn. While the aura is active, Relict in the area cannot be reduced past 1 hp. This Aura also deactivates if this character is stunned.
